```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Load data
df = read.csv('../data/matches/all_matches_processed.csv')
df$wonSet = as.factor(df$wonSet)
head(df)
```

```{r}
# Fit initial glm for sanity check
glm1 = glm(wonSet ~ unforcedErrs + earnedPts, df, family="binomial")
summary(glm1)
```

```{r}
err_conf = -rev(confint(glm1, 'unforcedErrs', 0.95))
earned_conf = confint(glm1, 'earnedPts', 0.95)
print(err_conf)
print(earned_conf)
```


```{r}
glm2 = glm(wonSet ~ servErr + unHitErr + unfErr + genErr + ace + kill + stuffBlock, df, family="binomial")
summary(glm2)
```

```{r}
cor(df[,8:17])
```
